page.title: 04THE PEOPLE OF ADDINGTON
page.content: The vast majority of the inhabitants of Addington village are aged between 40 or less,of the 60%,the highest seperate group is aged in the range 11_20 closely followed by 16% in the 21_30 group,of this total population 53% are women and 47% are men.Very few people work in Addington, as it is a very developed area.Most people work in either London,Croydon,Thornton Heath,Reigate or Redhill. 21% of the working people in Addington village have jobs in industry. The second most popular type of work is working as a civil servant. A high percentage of people were not born in this area.Most of the people that were not born in the area were born in either Scotland or some other part of Southern England. Some other popular places of origin are the Midlands,Wales and Ireland.
